author: Parikshit Mishra
title: Metaplanet Buys 1,111 Bitcoin for $117M, Pushes Total Holdings to Over 11K BTC
description: The firm's latest batch of buys was made at an average buying price of over $105,000 per bitcoin.
content:
Metaplanet, the Tokyo-listed hotel firm known for its bitcoin 
 acquisition strategy, has acquired 1,111 bitcoin for $117 million.The firm bought bitcoin at an average price of about $105681 per BTC… [+488 chars]
